mapper.select: SELECT BLDRGST_PK, NEW_OLD_REGSTR_GB_CD, --1: 신대장 PSTV_YN, SPCMT, PLAT_AREA, ARCH_AREA, BC_RAT, TOTAREA, VL_RAT_ESTM_TOTAREA, VL_RAT, MAIN_PURPS_CD, --CM024 (SELECT CD_NM FROM V_CMPCOMMCDMGM WHERE LGRP_CD = 'CM024' AND SGRP_CD = MAIN_PURPS_CD) AS MAIN_PURPS_CD_NM, ETC_PURPS, HHLD_CNT, FMLY_CNT, MAIN_BLD_CNT, ATCH_BLD_CNT, ATCH_BLD_AREA, TOT_PKNG_CNT, INDR_MECH_UTCNT, INDR_MECH_AREA, OUDR_MECH_UTCNT, OUDR_MECH_AREA, INDR_AUTO_UTCNT, INDR_AUTO_AREA, OUDR_AUTO_UTCNT, OUDR_AUTO_AREA, PMS_DAY, STCNS_DAY, USEAPR_DAY, PMSNO_YEAR, PMSNO_KIK_CD, --CM040 (SELECT CD_NM FROM V_CMPCOMMCDMGM WHERE LGRP_CD = 'CM040' AND SGRP_CD = PMSNO_KIK_CD) AS PMSNO_KIK_CD_NM, PMSNO_GB_CD, --CM039 (SELECT CD_NM FROM V_CMPCOMMCDMGM WHERE LGRP_CD = 'CM039' AND SGRP_CD = PMSNO_GB_CD) AS PMSNO_GB_CD_NM, PMSNO_SEQNO, HO_CNT FROM V_DJRRECAPTITLE_GIS WHERE BLDRGST_PK = #{bldrgstPk}

SELECT BLDRGST_PK, DONG_NM, MAIN_ATCH_GB_CD, --CM031 (SELECT CD_NM FROM V_CMPCOMMCDMGM WHERE LGRP_CD = 'CM031' AND SGRP_CD = MAIN_ATCH_GB_CD) AS MAIN_ATCH_GB_CD_NM, MAIN_ATCH_SEQNO, PSTV_YN, SPCMT, PLAT_AREA, ARCH_AREA, BC_RAT, TOTAREA, VL_RAT_ESTM_TOTAREA, VL_RAT, STRCT_CD, --CM004 (SELECT CD_NM FROM V_CMPCOMMCDMGM WHERE LGRP_CD = 'CM004' AND SGRP_CD = STRCT_CD) AS STRCT_CD_NM, ETC_STRCT, MAIN_PURPS_CD, --CM024 (SELECT CD_NM FROM V_CMPCOMMCDMGM WHERE LGRP_CD = 'CM024' AND SGRP_CD = MAIN_PURPS_CD) AS MAIN_PURPS_CD_NM, ETC_PURPS, ROOF_CD, --CM036 (SELECT CD_NM FROM V_CMPCOMMCDMGM WHERE LGRP_CD = 'CM036' AND SGRP_CD = ROOF_CD) AS ROOF_CD_NM, ETC_ROOF, HHLD_CNT, FMLY_CNT, HEIT, GRND_FLR_CNT, UGRND_FLR_CNT, RIDE_USE_ELVT_CNT, EMGEN_USE_ELVT_CNT, ATCH_BLD_CNT, ATCH_BLD_AREA, TOT_DONG_TOTAREA, INDR_MECH_UTCNT, INDR_MECH_AREA, OUDR_MECH_UTCNT, OUDR_MECH_AREA, INDR_AUTO_UTCNT, INDR_AUTO_AREA, OUDR_AUTO_UTCNT, OUDR_AUTO_AREA, PMS_DAY, STCNS_DAY, USEAPR_DAY, PMSNO_YEAR, PMSNO_KIK_CD, --CM040 (SELECT CD_NM FROM V_CMPCOMMCDMGM WHERE LGRP_CD = 'CM040' AND SGRP_CD = PMSNO_KIK_CD) AS PMSNO_KIK_CD_NM, PMSNO_GB_CD, --CM039 (SELECT CD_NM FROM V_CMPCOMMCDMGM WHERE LGRP_CD = 'CM039' AND SGRP_CD = PMSNO_GB_CD) AS PMSNO_GB_CD_NM, PMSNO_SEQNO, HO_CNT FROM V_DJRTITLE_GIS WHERE BLDRGST_PK = #{bldrgstPk}
